description.value: Character acquires a Greater Minion of Chaos, such as a Space Marine, Heretic Sorcerer, Mutant Monstrosity, etc. Talent can be taken more than once, each time adding another Greater minion.

system.benefit: Character acquires a Greater Minion of Chaos, such as a Space Marine, Heretic Sorcerer, Mutant Monstrosity, etc. Talent can be taken more than once, each time adding another Greater minion.

specialAbilities.name: Greater Daemon Traits
specialAbilities.description: Gain traits appropriate to a greater daemon of your patron god.
